description: HashiCorp Vault Metrics - CloudWatch Data Source

targets.label: Identity Entities
targets.sqlExpression: SELECT AVG(vault_identity_entity_count) FROM hcp WHERE cluster_id = 'vault-cluster-prod'

targets.label: Available Tokens
targets.sqlExpression: SELECT AVG(vault_token_creation) FROM hcp WHERE cluster_id = 'vault-cluster-prod'

list.description: CloudWatch namespace for HCP Vault metrics
list.label: Namespace
list.name: namespace

title: HCP Vault - CloudWatch
